2023.11.12

Joomla editors-xtd plugin PagebreakGhsvs. Editor button to insert special accordion markers. 2023.11.12

Joomla editor button. For pagebreakghsvs feature of system plugin plg_system_pagebreaksliderghsvs. Insert shortcodes into editor/article text that will be rendered to slides/accordions.

### Download
[plg_editors-xtd_pagebreakghsvs-2023.11.12.zip](https://github.com/GHSVS-de/plg_editors-xtd_pagebreakghsvs/raw/2023.11.12/dist/plg_editors-xtd_pagebreakghsvs-2023.11.12.zip)

### Joomla-Target-Platform(s)
3.&ast;, 4.&ast;, 5.&ast;
